colour_text.last_approved_text: He is a prince amongst beasts, always destined to lead.

character_trait_levels.colour_text: He is a prince amongst beasts, always destined to lead.

colour_text.last_approved_text: All Beastlords are exemplars of their race, but this one stands literally head and shoulders among his peers.

character_trait_levels.colour_text: All Beastlords are exemplars of their race, but this one stands literally head and shoulders among his peers.

colour_text.last_approved_text: To become the leader of the entire Warherd take a special kind of bestial rage, animal cunning, and a modicum of almost 'human' intelligence.

character_trait_levels.colour_text: To become the leader of the entire Warherd take a special kind of bestial rage, animal cunning, and a modicum of almost 'human' intelligence.

colour_text.last_approved_text: This one wants to go far, to ascend the hierarchy of the herd, to lead. By any means necessary.

character_trait_levels.colour_text: This one wants to go far, to ascend the hierarchy of the herd, to lead. By any means necessary.

colour_text.last_approved_text: If you cross him, or even get in his way, you're dead. Never think otherwise.

character_trait_levels.colour_text: "More kill, maybe Gods see. Maybe Gods like. More kill! MORE!"

colour_text.last_approved_text: When the rage takes him, the beast butchers and devours all who dare stand before him, regardless of their numbers.

character_trait_levels.colour_text: When the rage takes him, the beast butchers and devours all who dare stand before him, regardless of their numbers.

colour_text.last_approved_text: No matter the foe - its size, their numbers - he will take on all comers, win, and devour their flesh, making public display of their dismemberment.

character_trait_levels.colour_text: No matter the foe - its size, their numbers - he will take on all comers, win, and devour their flesh, making public display of their dismemberment.

colour_text.last_approved_text: Beastmen who fail to acknowledge his greatness don't tend to live much longer.

character_trait_levels.colour_text: Beastmen who fail to acknowledge his greatness don't tend to live much longer.

colour_text.last_approved_text: A champion even amongst his kind, the duel to the death is as meat and drink to this one.

character_trait_levels.colour_text: A champion even amongst his kind, the duel to the death is as meat and drink to this one.

colour_text.last_approved_text: Ascension to Hero or Beastlord requires many horns be collected along the way.

character_trait_levels.colour_text: Ascension to Hero or Beastlord requires many horns be collected along the way.

colour_text.last_approved_text: Beastmen love to drink, almost as much as they like to kill and devour. This one craves the nectar of his own ruin.

character_trait_levels.colour_text: Beastmen love to drink, almost as much as they like to kill and devour. This one craves the nectar of his own ruin.

colour_text.last_approved_text: So consumed by alcohol's Chaotic nature, that he cannot function, even hunt, without a skinful upon waking.

character_trait_levels.colour_text: So consumed by alcohol's Chaotic nature, that he cannot function, even hunt, without a skinful upon waking.

colour_text.last_approved_text: Battles are a distraction really, taking away from this Beastman's true calling.

character_trait_levels.colour_text: Battles are a distraction really, taking away from this Beastman's true calling.

colour_text.last_approved_text: At the herdstone, beneath the glowering, weird moon, he gloats of his kills, his trophies, his triumphs.

character_trait_levels.colour_text: At the herdstone, beneath the glowering, weird moon, he gloats of his kills, his trophies, his triumphs.

character_trait_levels.colour_text: Beasts like to drink to destruction, boasting and taunting each other to greater acts of savagery.

colour_text.last_approved_text: Such is his prowess on the field of battle that none dare challenge his words around the herdstone at midnight.

character_trait_levels.colour_text: Such is his prowess on the field of battle that none dare challenge his words around the herdstone at midnight.

colour_text.last_approved_text: He screams, bellows, shoves and cajoles those around him to ensure compliance to his will.

colour_text.last_approved_text: Do the job, and do it well.

character_trait_levels.colour_text: "Who deserves my patronage?"

colour_text.last_approved_text: They say be cruel to be kind…

character_trait_levels.colour_text: They say be cruel to be kind…

character_trait_levels.colour_text: "You will lead them to the End Times - oh, master of fear and terror."

colour_text.last_approved_text: Do not waste time with pity, there is nothing to be gained from such a pointless emotion.

colour_text.last_approved_text: A callous side will serve this one well.

character_trait_levels.colour_text: A callous side will serve this one well.

character_trait_levels.colour_text: Mercy is for the weak and the foolish.

colour_text.last_approved_text: "I am the shield that surrounds my realm."

character_trait_levels.colour_text: "I am the shield that surrounds my realm."

character_trait_levels.colour_text: Should the folk live defenceless and in squalor they will turn to other, darker forces.

colour_text.last_approved_text: "Some folk call me vicious. I'll scoop out the eyes of any who utter it in my presence."

colour_text.last_approved_text: Violence solves everything!

character_trait_levels.colour_text: "Blood! Slaughter! Blood!"

colour_text.last_approved_text: The gods are real and they watch us. Show them due reverence!

character_trait_levels.colour_text: The gods are real and they watch us. Show them due reverence!

colour_text.last_approved_text: Believing is not an issue, it is catching their attention - for there are so many voices that call out to the gods.

colour_text.last_approved_text: "He has sent me a message to deliver, and it is doom."

character_trait_levels.colour_text: "He has sent me a message to deliver, and it is doom."

character_trait_levels.colour_text: A healthy respect of the myriad gods is better than none at all.

character_trait_levels.colour_text: "Yes, pray or beseech your god - he may even hear you."

colour_text.last_approved_text: There was once an Emperor who became known as the Pious, and his legend lives on.

character_trait_levels.colour_text: There was once an Emperor who became known as the Pious, and his legend lives on.

character_trait_levels.colour_text: "If ever there was a smiling assassin… "

character_trait_levels.colour_text: You have traitor's blood running in your veins, as your fallen friends know only too well.

character_trait_levels.colour_text: He has an excellent physique, put it to good use!

colour_text.last_approved_text: "I don't just throw a spanner in the works, but the wrench and the whole Taal-damned toolbox as well!"

character_trait_levels.colour_text: "I ain't got time for finesse, not when a deep slice across the throat does the job just as well."

character_trait_levels.colour_text: Murder those in power and watch the powerless quail.
